$Joel Youngblood was traded by the Mets to the Expos earlier in the day; he played the begining of the Mets game in Chicago and then flew to Philadelphia; this is the day he got a hit in two cities for two teams off two future Hall of Famers: Fergie Jenkins earlier and Steve Carlton here1982PHI.EVN.regular.comment.csv"
